import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Rating = ({value, text, color}) => { return (
=1 ? 'fas fa-star':value>=0.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-satr'}> =2 ? 'fas fa-star':value>=1.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-satr'}> =3 ? 'fas fa-star':value>=2.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-satr'}> =4 ? 'fas fa-star':value>=3.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-satr'}> =5 ? 'fas fa-star':value>=4.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-satr'}> {text && text}
) } Rating.defaultProps = { color:'#f8e825' } Rating.propTypes = { value: PropTypes.number.isRequired, text: PropTypes.string.isRequired, color: PropTypes.string, } export default Rating
